ul.li: EntitlementProgramAdministrator is a kind of PlanSponsor
EmployerSponsor is a kind of PlanSponsor

section.title: Description
section.p: The company or organization that assumes financial responsibility for an insured group. Note that the Plan Sponsor could be a government agency in charge of an Entitlement Program, not just private groups such as Employers.
"An entity that sponsors a health plan. Employer, Union" - Medicare.

stentry.p: Pointer to the Group Health Insurance Policy which the Plan Sponsor has funded for the benefit of a group of individuals.
